sentences.en: A sleep will do you the world of good.
sentences.cn: 睡一觉你就会感觉舒服多了。

sentences.en: After a good night's sleep I feel fighting fit again.
sentences.cn: 昨夜睡得很香，我又觉得自己精力充沛了。

sentences.en: After a good night's sleep, Paul said he was raring to go.
sentences.cn: 睡了一夜好觉后，保罗说他已经迫不及待了。

sentences.en: Did you sleep well?
sentences.cn: 你睡得好吗？

sentences.en: Go to sleep. I've got a long day tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 睡觉吧。我明天还得忙呢。

sentences.en: He awoke from his sleep in a cold sweat.
sentences.cn: 他从睡梦中醒来，浑身冒着冷汗。

sentences.en: He looked at Ellen, breathing evenly in her sleep.
sentences.cn: 他看着埃伦，她正呼吸均匀地睡着。

sentences.en: He mumbled some lame excuse about having gone to sleep.
sentences.cn: 他含含糊糊地找了个蹩脚的借口，想要解释自己为什么睡着了。

sentences.en: He was nodding off to sleep in an armchair.
sentences.cn: 他坐在扶手椅上打盹，睡着了。

sentences.en: He’s lucky because at least he has somewhere to sleep.
sentences.cn: 他算是幸运的，至少还有个睡觉的地方。

sentences.en: Her eyes were red through lack of sleep.
sentences.cn: 因为缺少睡眠，她双眼通红。

sentences.en: I didn't get a wink of sleep on the aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 我在飞机上没合一下眼。

sentences.en: I didn’t get much sleep last night.
sentences.cn: 我昨天晚上睡得不多。

sentences.en: I usually sleep on my back.
sentences.cn: 我一般仰卧着睡觉。

sentences.en: I was falling apart. I wasn't getting any sleep.
sentences.cn: 我要崩溃了，我一直都没合眼。

sentences.en: I would sooner give up sleep than miss my evening class.
sentences.cn: 我宁可不睡觉，也不愿错过晚上的课。

sentences.en: Jem was full of beans after a long sleep.
sentences.cn: 杰姆好好睡了一觉之后又变得精力充沛了。

sentences.en: She died peacefully in her sleep.
sentences.cn: 她在睡梦中安然去世。

sentences.en: She had woken me out of a sound sleep.
sentences.cn: 她把我从酣睡中叫醒。

sentences.en: she knew the music perfectly, could sing it in her sleep.
sentences.cn: 她非常熟悉这首音乐，睡着也能唱。

sentences.en: She said his friends could sleep over in the big room downstairs.
sentences.cn: 她说他的朋友们可以在楼下的大房间里住一晚。

sentences.en: The squad members paired off to find places to eat and sleep.
sentences.cn: 小组成员结对儿找地方吃饭睡觉。

words.tran_cn: 失眠的；不休息的；警觉的；永不停息的
欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的

phrases.tran_cn: 深度睡眠；睡眠的深层状态

phrases.phrase: one could do something in one's sleep
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)睡着也能做，不用想也能做完
（用毒品、酒精或麻醉剂）使某人失去知觉
(婉)使（老、幼、重伤动物）无痛死去
快速眼动睡眠（等于paradoxical sleep）
睡眠呼吸暂停；睡眠呼吸中止症
(非正式)把（问题等）留到第二天再作决定
v. 借宿，在别人家里过夜；忽视
睡着一直什么也没听见；也没被唤醒或惊醒
睡个好觉（晚上分别时用语）
睁着一只眼睛睡，睡得不好
与某人同眠共枕；与某人发生性关系

trans.tran_en: the natural state of resting your mind and body, usually at night
to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed
to rest your mind and body, usually at night when you are lying in bed with your eyes closed

trans.tran_cn: 为…提供床位，提供住宿，以睡觉打发日子
